00063 #include <config.h>

00065 #include "i_graph.h"

00067 L_Alloc_Pool *GraphPool = NULL;
00068 L_Alloc_Pool *GraphNodePool = NULL;
00069 L_Alloc_Pool *GraphArcPool = NULL;
00070 L_Alloc_Pool *GraphEquivCDPool = NULL;
00071 
00072 GraphNode Graph_create_graph_node_given_id(Graph graph, int new_id) {
00073         GraphNode new_graph_node;
00074 
00075         if (Graph_node_from_id_or_null(graph, new_id))
00076                 I_punt("Graph_create_graph_node_given_id:  id already in use\n");
00077 
00078         if (!GraphNodePool)
00079                 GraphNodePool = L_create_alloc_pool("_GraphNode", sizeof(_GraphNode),
00080                                 128);
00081 
00082         new_graph_node = (GraphNode) L_alloc(GraphNodePool);
00083         new_graph_node->id = new_id;
00084         new_graph_node->ptr = NULL;
00085         new_graph_node->dom = NULL;
00086         new_graph_node->flags = 0;
00087         new_graph_node->tflags = 0;
00088         new_graph_node->info = 0;
00089         new_graph_node->post_dom = NULL;
00090         new_graph_node->imm_dom = NULL;
00091         new_graph_node->imm_post_dom = NULL;
00092         new_graph_node->contr_dep = NULL;
00093         new_graph_node->equiv_cd = NULL;
00094         new_graph_node->pred = NULL;
00095         new_graph_node->succ = NULL;
00096 
00097         graph->nodes = List_insert_last(graph->nodes, new_graph_node);
00098         graph->flags = GRAPHMODIFIED; /*  wipes out all other flags  */
00099         HashTable_insert(graph->hash_id_node, new_graph_node->id, new_graph_node);
00100 
00101         return new_graph_node;
00102 }
00103 
00104 GraphNode Graph_create_graph_node(Graph graph) {
00105         return Graph_create_graph_node_given_id(graph, ++graph->node_id);
00106 }
00107 
00108 static GraphNode Graph_free_graph_node(GraphNode graph_node) {
00109         Set_dispose(graph_node->dom);
00110         Set_dispose(graph_node->post_dom);
00111         Set_dispose(graph_node->contr_dep);
00112         List_reset(graph_node->pred);
00113         List_reset(graph_node->succ);
00114 
00115         L_free(GraphNodePool, graph_node);
00116 
00117         return NULL;
00118 }
00119 
00120 static GraphArc Graph_free_graph_arc(GraphArc graph_arc) {
00121         L_free(GraphArcPool, graph_arc);
00122 
00123         return NULL;
00124 }
00125 
00126 GraphArc Graph_create_graph_arc_given_id(Graph graph, int new_id) {
00127         GraphArc new_graph_arc;
00128 
00129         if (Graph_arc_from_id_or_null(graph, new_id))
00130                 I_punt("Graph_create_graph_arc_given_id:  id already in use\n");
00131 
00132         if (!GraphArcPool)
00133                 GraphArcPool = L_create_alloc_pool("_GraphArc", sizeof(_GraphArc), 128);
00134 
00135         new_graph_arc = (GraphArc) L_alloc(GraphArcPool);
00136         new_graph_arc->id = new_id;
00137         new_graph_arc->flags = 0;
00138         new_graph_arc->info = 0;
00139         new_graph_arc->ptr = NULL;
00140         new_graph_arc->pred = NULL;
00141         new_graph_arc->succ = NULL;
00142 
00143         graph->arcs = List_insert_last(graph->arcs, new_graph_arc);
00144         graph->flags = GRAPHMODIFIED; /* wipes out all other flags */
00145         HashTable_insert(graph->hash_id_arc, new_graph_arc->id, new_graph_arc);
00146 
00147         return new_graph_arc;
00148 }
00149 
00150 GraphArc Graph_create_graph_arc(Graph graph) {
00151         return Graph_create_graph_arc_given_id(graph, ++graph->arc_id);
00152 }
00153 
00154 static GraphEquivCD Graph_new_graph_equiv_cd() {
00155         GraphEquivCD new_graph_equiv_cd;
00156 
00157         if (!GraphEquivCDPool)
00158                 GraphEquivCDPool = L_create_alloc_pool("_EquivCD",
00159                                 sizeof(_GraphEquivCD), 128);
00160 
00161         new_graph_equiv_cd = (GraphEquivCD) L_alloc(GraphEquivCDPool);
00162         new_graph_equiv_cd->id = 0;
00163         new_graph_equiv_cd->ptr = NULL;
00164         new_graph_equiv_cd->contr_dep = NULL;
00165         new_graph_equiv_cd->nodes = NULL;
00166         new_graph_equiv_cd->arcs = NULL;
00167 
00168         return new_graph_equiv_cd;
00169 }
00170 
00171 GraphEquivCD Graph_create_graph_equiv_cd(Graph graph) {
00172         GraphEquivCD new_graph_equiv_cd;
00173 
00174         new_graph_equiv_cd = Graph_new_graph_equiv_cd();
00175         graph->equiv_cds = List_insert_last(graph->equiv_cds, new_graph_equiv_cd);
00176         new_graph_equiv_cd->id = List_size(graph->equiv_cds);
00177         HashTable_insert(graph->hash_id_equiv_cd, new_graph_equiv_cd->id,
00178                         new_graph_equiv_cd);
00179 
00180         return new_graph_equiv_cd;
00181 }
00182 
00183 GraphEquivCD Graph_free_graph_equiv_cd(GraphEquivCD graph_equiv_cd) {
00184         if (graph_equiv_cd->contr_dep)
00185                 Set_dispose(graph_equiv_cd->contr_dep);
00186 
00187         if (graph_equiv_cd->nodes)
00188                 List_reset(graph_equiv_cd->nodes);
00189 
00190         if (graph_equiv_cd->arcs)
00191                 List_reset(graph_equiv_cd->arcs);
00192 
00193         L_free(GraphEquivCDPool, graph_equiv_cd);
00194 
00195         return NULL;
00196 }
00197 
00198 Graph Graph_create_graph() {
00199         Graph new_graph;
00200 
00201         if (!GraphPool)
00202                 GraphPool = L_create_alloc_pool("_Graph", sizeof(_Graph), 8);
00203 
00204         new_graph = (Graph) L_alloc(GraphPool);
00205         new_graph->root = NULL;
00206         new_graph->nodes = NULL;
00207         new_graph->arcs = NULL;
00208         new_graph->equiv_cds = NULL;
00209 
00210         new_graph->flags = GRAPHMODIFIED; /* wipes out all other flags */
00211 
00212         new_graph->topo_list = NULL;
00213         new_graph->rev_topo_list = NULL;
00214         new_graph->dfs_list = NULL;
00215 
00216         new_graph->hash_id_node = HashTable_create(256);
00217         new_graph->hash_id_arc = HashTable_create(512);
00218         new_graph->hash_id_equiv_cd = HashTable_create(256);
00219 
00220         new_graph->node_id = 0;
00221         new_graph->arc_id = 0;
00222 
00223         return new_graph;
00224 }
00225 
00226 Graph Graph_free_graph(Graph graph) {
00227         GraphNode node;
00228         GraphArc arc;
00229         GraphEquivCD equiv_cd;
00230 
00231         List_start(graph->nodes);
00232         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes)))
00233                 Graph_free_graph_node(node);
00234 
00235         List_start(graph->arcs);
00236         while ((arc = (GraphArc) List_next(graph->arcs)))
00237                 Graph_free_graph_arc(arc);
00238 
00239         List_start(graph->equiv_cds);
00240         while ((equiv_cd = (GraphEquivCD) List_next(graph->equiv_cds)))
00241                 Graph_free_graph_equiv_cd(equiv_cd);
00242 
00243         List_reset(graph->nodes);
00244         List_reset(graph->arcs);
00245         List_reset(graph->equiv_cds);
00246         List_reset(graph->topo_list);
00247         List_reset(graph->rev_topo_list);
00248         List_reset(graph->dfs_list);
00249 
00250         HashTable_free(graph->hash_id_node);
00251         HashTable_free(graph->hash_id_arc);
00252         HashTable_free(graph->hash_id_equiv_cd);
00253 
00254         L_free(GraphPool, graph);
00255 
00256 #if 0
00257         if (GraphPool)
00258         L_print_alloc_info (stderr, GraphPool, 0);
00259         if (GraphNodePool)
00260         L_print_alloc_info (stderr, GraphNodePool, 0);
00261         if (GraphArcPool)
00262         L_print_alloc_info (stderr, GraphArcPool, 0);
00263         if (GraphEquivCDPool)
00264         L_print_alloc_info (stderr, GraphEquivCDPool, 0);
00265 #endif
00266 
00267         return NULL;
00268 }
00269 
00270 GraphNode Graph_node_from_id(Graph graph, int id) {
00271         return ((GraphNode) HashTable_find(graph->hash_id_node, id));
00272 }
00273 
00274 GraphNode Graph_node_from_id_or_null(Graph graph, int id) {
00275         return ((GraphNode) HashTable_find_or_null(graph->hash_id_node, id));
00276 }
00277 
00278 GraphArc Graph_arc_from_id(Graph graph, int id) {
00279         return ((GraphArc) HashTable_find(graph->hash_id_arc, id));
00280 }
00281 
00282 GraphArc Graph_arc_from_id_or_null(Graph graph, int id) {
00283         return ((GraphArc) HashTable_find_or_null(graph->hash_id_arc, id));
00284 }
00285 
00286 GraphEquivCD Graph_equiv_cd_from_id(Graph graph, int id) {
00287         return ((GraphEquivCD) HashTable_find(graph->hash_id_equiv_cd, id));
00288 }
00289 
00290 int Graph_size(Graph graph) {
00291         if (!graph)
00292                 I_punt("Graph not initialized");
00293 
00294         return List_size(graph->nodes);
00295 }
00296 
00297 GraphArc Graph_connect_nodes_with_weight(Graph graph, GraphNode src_node,
00298                 GraphNode dest_node,int wcet_weight){
00299 
00300                 GraphArc new_graph_arc;
00301                 new_graph_arc = Graph_create_graph_arc(graph);
00302                 new_graph_arc->succ = dest_node;
00303                 new_graph_arc->pred = src_node;
00304 
00305                 new_graph_arc->wcet_weight = wcet_weight;
00306 
00307                 src_node->succ = List_insert_last(src_node->succ, new_graph_arc);
00308                 dest_node->pred = List_insert_last(dest_node->pred, new_graph_arc);
00309 
00310                 return new_graph_arc;
00311 }
00312 
00313 GraphArc Graph_connect_nodes(Graph graph, GraphNode src_node,
00314                 GraphNode dest_node) {
00315         GraphArc new_graph_arc;
00316         new_graph_arc = Graph_create_graph_arc(graph);
00317         new_graph_arc->succ = dest_node;
00318         new_graph_arc->pred = src_node;
00319 
00320         src_node->succ = List_insert_last(src_node->succ, new_graph_arc);
00321         dest_node->pred = List_insert_last(dest_node->pred, new_graph_arc);
00322 
00323         return new_graph_arc;
00324 }
00325 
00326 int Graph_delete_unreachable(Graph graph, void(*node_ptr_del)(void *),
00327                 void(*arc_ptr_del)(void *)) {
00328         GraphArc arc;
00329         GraphNode node, snode;
00330         int count = 0;
00331 
00332         count = Graph_topological_sort(graph);
00333 
00334         graph->flags &= ~GRAPHTOPOSORT;
00335 
00336         if (graph->topo_list)
00337                 graph->topo_list = List_reset(graph->topo_list);
00338 
00339         if (!count)
00340                 return 0;
00341 
00342         List_start(graph->nodes);
00343         while ((node = List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00344                 if (node->info != -1)
00345                         continue;
00346 
00347                 List_start(node->succ);
00348                 while ((arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->succ))) {
00349                         snode = arc->succ;
00350 
00351                         snode->pred = List_remove(snode->pred, arc);
00352                         if (arc_ptr_del && GraphArcContents(arc))
00353                                 arc_ptr_del(GraphArcContents(arc));
00354 
00355                         graph->arcs = List_remove(graph->arcs, arc);
00356                         Graph_free_graph_arc(arc);
00357                 }
00358         }
00359 
00360         List_start(graph->nodes);
00361         while ((node = List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00362                 if (node->info != -1)
00363                         continue;
00364 
00365                 graph->nodes = List_delete_current(graph->nodes);
00366 
00367                 if (node_ptr_del && GraphNodeContents(node))
00368                         node_ptr_del(GraphNodeContents(node));
00369 
00370                 Graph_free_graph_node(node);
00371         }
00372 
00373         return count;
00374 }
00375 
00376 static void Graph_daVinci_visit(GraphNode node, FILE * daVinci_file,
00377                 void(*print_ptr_func)(FILE *, GraphNode)) {
00378         GraphArc succ_arc;
00379 
00380         if (node->tflags == GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_BLACK) {
00381                 fprintf(daVinci_file, "r(\"");
00382                 print_ptr_func(daVinci_file, node);
00383                 fprintf(daVinci_file, "\")");
00384                 return;
00385         }
00386 
00387         node->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_BLACK;
00388 
00389         /* Define Object */
00390         fprintf(daVinci_file, "l(\"");
00391         print_ptr_func(daVinci_file, node);
00392         fprintf(daVinci_file, "\",");
00393 
00394         fprintf(daVinci_file, "n(\"anything\", [a(\"OBJECT\", \"");
00395         print_ptr_func(daVinci_file, node);
00396         fprintf(daVinci_file, "\")],\n[");
00397 
00398         /* Define Edges */
00399         List_start(node->succ);
00400         while ((succ_arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->succ))) {
00401                 fprintf(daVinci_file, "e(\"anything\",[");
00402                 if (Set_in(node->dom, succ_arc->succ->id)) {
00403                         fprintf(daVinci_file, "a(\"EDGECOLOR\",\"red\")");
00404                 } else {
00405                         fprintf(daVinci_file, "a(\"EDGECOLOR\",\"black\")");
00406                 }
00407                 fprintf(daVinci_file, "],");
00408                 Graph_daVinci_visit(succ_arc->succ, daVinci_file, print_ptr_func);
00409                 fprintf(daVinci_file, ")");
00410                 if (List_get_next(node->succ)) {
00411                         fprintf(daVinci_file, ",");
00412                 }
00413         }
00414 
00415         /* Define Object */
00416         fprintf(daVinci_file, "]))");
00417 }
00418 
00419 /* Assumes dominator has been performed */
00420 void Graph_daVinci(Graph graph, char *filename,
00421                 void(*print_ptr_func)(FILE *, GraphNode)) {
00422         FILE *daVinci_file = NULL;
00423         GraphNode node;
00424 
00425         if (!(graph->flags & GRAPHDOM))
00426                 Graph_dominator(graph);
00427 
00428         daVinci_file = I_open_output_file(filename);
00429 
00430         fprintf(daVinci_file, "[\n");
00431 
00432         /* Clear the visited bit flag */
00433         List_start(graph->nodes);
00434         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes)))
00435                 node->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_WHITE;
00436 
00437         Graph_daVinci_visit(graph->root, daVinci_file, print_ptr_func);
00438 
00439         fprintf(daVinci_file, "]\n");
00440 
00441         I_close_output_file(daVinci_file);
00442 }
00443 
00444 void Graph_daVinci_visit2(GraphNode node, void(*output_str_fn)(char *),
00445                 void(*print_node_fn)(GraphNode, char *, int),
00446                 void(*print_arc_fn)(GraphArc, char *, int), int detail) {
00447         GraphArc succ_arc;
00448         char buffer[10192];
00449         int detail_copy = detail & DAV_ALL_NODE_PROPERTIES;
00450 
00451         if (node->tflags == GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_BLACK) {
00452                 sprintf(buffer, "r(\"");
00453                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00454                 print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_ID);
00455                 /*      print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_OBJECT);  */
00456                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00457                 sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00458                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00459                 return;
00460         }
00461         node->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_BLACK;
00462 
00463         /* Define Object */
00464         sprintf(buffer, "l(\"");
00465         output_str_fn(buffer);
00466         print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_ID);
00467         /*   print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_OBJECT);  */
00468         output_str_fn(buffer);
00469         sprintf(buffer, "\",n(\"");
00470         output_str_fn(buffer);
00471         print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_TYPE);
00472         output_str_fn(buffer);
00473         sprintf(buffer, "\",");
00474         output_str_fn(buffer);
00475 
00476         /*  give node attributes  */
00477         sprintf(buffer, "[");
00478         output_str_fn(buffer);
00479         if (EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (detail, DAV_OBJECT)) {
00480                 sprintf(buffer, "a(\"OBJECT\",\"");
00481                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00482                 print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_OBJECT);
00483                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00484                 sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00485                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00486         }
00487 
00488         detail_copy &= ~DAV_OBJECT;
00489         if (detail_copy) {
00490                 sprintf(buffer, ",");
00491                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00492         }
00493 
00494         if (EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (detail, DAV_FONTFAMILY)) {
00495                 sprintf(buffer, "a(\"FONTFAMILY\",\"");
00496                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00497                 print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_FONTFAMILY);
00498                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00499                 sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00500                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00501         }
00502 
00503         detail_copy &= ~DAV_FONTFAMILY;
00504         if (detail_copy) {
00505                 sprintf(buffer, ",");
00506                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00507         }
00508 
00509         if (EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (detail, DAV_FONTSTYLE)) {
00510                 sprintf(buffer, "a(\"FONTSTYLE\",\"");
00511                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00512                 print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_FONTSTYLE);
00513                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00514                 sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00515                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00516         }
00517 
00518         detail_copy &= ~DAV_FONTSTYLE;
00519         if (detail_copy) {
00520                 sprintf(buffer, ",");
00521                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00522         }
00523 
00524         if (EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (detail, DAV_COLOR)) {
00525                 sprintf(buffer, "a(\"COLOR\",\"");
00526                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00527                 print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_COLOR);
00528                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00529                 sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00530                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00531         }
00532 
00533         detail_copy &= ~DAV_COLOR;
00534         if (detail_copy) {
00535                 sprintf(buffer, ",");
00536                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00537         }
00538 
00539         if (EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (detail, DAV_GO)) {
00540                 sprintf(buffer, "a(\"_GO\",\"");
00541                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00542                 print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_GO);
00543                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00544                 sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00545                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00546         }
00547 
00548         detail_copy &= ~DAV_GO;
00549         if (detail_copy) {
00550                 sprintf(buffer, ",");
00551                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00552         }
00553 
00554         if (EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (detail, DAV_HIDDEN)) {
00555                 sprintf(buffer, "a(\"HIDDEN\",\"");
00556                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00557                 print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_HIDDEN);
00558                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00559                 sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00560                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00561         }
00562 
00563         detail_copy &= ~DAV_HIDDEN;
00564         if (detail_copy) {
00565                 sprintf(buffer, ",");
00566                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00567         }
00568 
00569         if (EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (detail, DAV_BORDER)) {
00570                 sprintf(buffer, "a(\"BORDER\",\"");
00571                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00572                 print_node_fn(node, buffer, DAV_BORDER);
00573                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00574                 sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00575                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00576         }
00577 
00578         sprintf(buffer, "],");
00579         output_str_fn(buffer);
00580 
00581         /* Define Edges */
00582         sprintf(buffer, "[");
00583         output_str_fn(buffer);
00584 
00585         List_start(node->succ);
00586         while ((succ_arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->succ))) {
00587                 sprintf(buffer, "e(\"");
00588                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00589                 print_arc_fn(succ_arc, buffer, DAV_TYPE);
00590                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00591                 sprintf(buffer, "\",");
00592                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00593 
00594                 /* give arc attributes  */
00595                 detail_copy = detail & DAV_ALL_EDGE_PROPERTIES;
00596                 sprintf(buffer, "[");
00597                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00598 
00599                 if (EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (detail, DAV_EDGECOLOR)) {
00600                         sprintf(buffer, "a(\"EDGECOLOR\",\"");
00601                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00602                         print_arc_fn(succ_arc, buffer, DAV_EDGECOLOR);
00603                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00604                         sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00605                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00606                 }
00607 
00608                 detail_copy &= ~DAV_EDGECOLOR;
00609                 if (detail_copy) {
00610                         sprintf(buffer, ",");
00611                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00612                 }
00613 
00614                 if (EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (detail, DAV_EDGEPATTERN)) {
00615                         sprintf(buffer, "a(\"EDGEPATTERN\",\"");
00616                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00617                         print_arc_fn(succ_arc, buffer, DAV_EDGEPATTERN);
00618                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00619                         sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00620                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00621                 }
00622 
00623                 detail_copy &= ~DAV_EDGEPATTERN;
00624                 if (detail_copy) {
00625                         sprintf(buffer, ",");
00626                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00627                 }
00628 
00629                 if (EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (detail, DAV_EDGEDIR)) {
00630                         sprintf(buffer, "a(\"_DIR\",\"");
00631                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00632                         print_arc_fn(succ_arc, buffer, DAV_EDGEDIR);
00633                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00634                         sprintf(buffer, "\")");
00635                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00636                 }
00637 
00638                 sprintf(buffer, "],");
00639                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00640 
00641                 Graph_daVinci_visit2(succ_arc->succ, output_str_fn, print_node_fn,
00642                                 print_arc_fn, detail);
00643 
00644                 sprintf(buffer, ")");
00645                 output_str_fn(buffer);
00646 
00647                 if (List_get_next(node->succ)) {
00648                         sprintf(buffer, ",");
00649                         output_str_fn(buffer);
00650                 }
00651         }
00652 
00653         /* Define Object */
00654         sprintf(buffer, "]))");
00655         output_str_fn(buffer);
00656 
00657         return;
00658 }
00659 
00660 void Graph_daVinci2(Graph graph, void(*output_str_fn)(char *),
00661                 void(*print_node_fn)(GraphNode, char *, int),
00662                 void(*print_arc_fn)(GraphArc, char *, int), int detail) {
00663         char buffer[30];
00664         GraphNode node;
00665 
00666         if (!(graph->flags & GRAPHDOM))
00667                 Graph_dominator(graph);
00668 
00669         /*  clear the visited bit flag  */
00670         List_start(graph->nodes);
00671         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes)))
00672                 node->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_WHITE;
00673 
00674         sprintf(buffer, "[");
00675         output_str_fn(buffer);
00676 
00677         Graph_daVinci_visit2(GraphRootNode (graph), output_str_fn, print_node_fn,
00678                         print_arc_fn, detail);
00679 
00680         sprintf(buffer, "]");
00681         output_str_fn(buffer);
00682 
00683         return;
00684 }
00685 
00686 /*  
00687  *  This function can be used to output graphs with multiple, 
00688  *  possibly disjoint, roots.  It assumes that the true root of 
00689  *  the graph is a dummy node that points to all other root
00690  *  nodes.  The dummy node, usually given id -1 is not shown
00691  *  in the daVinci graph.
00692  */
00693 void Graph_daVinci2_multi_root(Graph graph, void(*output_str_fn)(char *),
00694                 void(*print_node_fn)(GraphNode, char *, int),
00695                 void(*print_arc_fn)(GraphArc, char *, int), int detail) {
00696         char buffer[30];
00697         List from_start_arc_list;
00698         GraphArc from_start_arc;
00699         GraphNode node;
00700 
00701         if (!(graph->flags & GRAPHDOM))
00702                 Graph_dominator(graph);
00703 
00704         /*  clear the visited bit flag  */
00705         List_start(graph->nodes);
00706         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes)))
00707                 node->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_WHITE;
00708 
00709         from_start_arc_list = GraphRootNode (graph)->succ;
00710         from_start_arc = (GraphArc) List_first(from_start_arc_list);
00711 
00712         sprintf(buffer, "[");
00713         output_str_fn(buffer);
00714 
00715         while (from_start_arc != NULL) {
00716                 Graph_daVinci_visit2(from_start_arc->succ, output_str_fn,
00717                                 print_node_fn, print_arc_fn, detail);
00718 
00719                 from_start_arc = (GraphArc) List_next(from_start_arc_list);
00720 
00721                 if (from_start_arc != NULL)
00722                         output_str_fn(",");
00723         }
00724 
00725         sprintf(buffer, "]");
00726         output_str_fn(buffer);
00727 
00728         return;
00729 }
00730 
00731 /*===========================================================================*/
00732 
00733 /* Dominator has been performed */
00734 void Graph_imm_dominator(Graph graph) {
00735         GraphNode node;
00736         GraphNode topo_node;
00737 
00738         if (graph->flags & GRAPHIMMDOM)
00739                 return;
00740 
00741         if (!(graph->flags & GRAPHDOM))
00742                 Graph_dominator(graph);
00743 
00744         List_start(graph->nodes);
00745         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00746                 node->imm_dom = NULL;
00747                 List_start(graph->topo_list);
00748                 while ((topo_node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->topo_list))) {
00749                         if (topo_node == node)
00750                                 break;
00751                         if (Set_in(node->dom, topo_node->id))
00752                                 node->imm_dom = topo_node;
00753                 }
00754         }
00755         graph->flags |= GRAPHIMMDOM;
00756 }
00757 
00758 /* Graph_dominator will work with back edges, however these back edges
00759  * can NOT connect to the first node in the graph.
00760  */
00761 void Graph_dominator(Graph graph) {
00762         GraphNode node;
00763         GraphNode pred;
00764         GraphArc arc;
00765         Set all;
00766         int change;
00767         Set new_dom;
00768 
00769         /* haven't run dominator before on this graph */
00770         if (graph->flags & GRAPHDOM)
00771                 return;
00772 
00773         /*
00774          *    Initialization
00775          */
00776         all = NULL;
00777         List_start(graph->nodes);
00778         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00779                 if (node->dom)
00780                         node->dom = Set_dispose(node->dom);
00781                 all = Set_add(all, node->id);
00782         }
00783         List_start(graph->nodes);
00784         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00785                 if (List_size(node->pred))
00786                         node->dom = Set_union(0, all);
00787                 else
00788                         node->dom = Set_add(NULL, node->id);
00789         }
00790 
00791         /*
00792          *    Compute dominance relationship
00793          */
00794         change = 1;
00795         while (change) {
00796                 change = 0;
00797 
00798                 List_start(graph->nodes);
00799                 while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00800                         new_dom = NULL;
00801                         List_start(node->pred);
00802                         while ((arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->pred))) {
00803                                 pred = arc->pred;
00804                                 if (new_dom)
00805                                         new_dom = Set_intersect_acc(new_dom, pred->dom);
00806                                 else
00807                                         new_dom = Set_union(new_dom, pred->dom);
00808                         }
00809                         new_dom = Set_add(new_dom, node->id);
00810                         if (!Set_same(new_dom, node->dom)) {
00811                                 change += 1;
00812                                 node->dom = Set_dispose(node->dom);
00813                                 node->dom = new_dom;
00814                         } else
00815                                 Set_dispose(new_dom);
00816                 }
00817         }
00818         all = Set_dispose(all);
00819 
00820         graph->flags |= GRAPHDOM;
00821 }
00822 
00823 #if 0
00824 void
00825 Graph_print_dominator (Graph graph)
00826 {
00827         GraphNode node;
00828 
00829         List_start (graph->nodes);
00830         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next (graph->nodes)))
00831         {
00832                 printf ("Node %d:\n  ", node->id);
00833                 PSET (node->dom);
00834         }
00835 }
00836 #endif
00837 
00838 /*===========================================================================*/
00839 
00840 /* Post dominator has been performed */
00841 void Graph_imm_post_dominator(Graph graph) {
00842         GraphNode node;
00843         GraphNode topo_node;
00844 
00845         if (graph->flags & GRAPHIMMPOSTDOM)
00846                 return;
00847 
00848         if (!(graph->flags & GRAPHPOSTDOM))
00849                 Graph_post_dominator(graph);
00850 
00851         List_start(graph->nodes);
00852         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00853                 node->imm_post_dom = NULL;
00854                 List_start(graph->topo_list);
00855                 while ((topo_node = (GraphNode) List_prev(graph->topo_list))) {
00856                         if (topo_node == node)
00857                                 break;
00858                         if (Set_in(node->post_dom, topo_node->id))
00859                                 node->imm_post_dom = topo_node;
00860                 }
00861         }
00862         graph->flags |= GRAPHIMMPOSTDOM;
00863 }
00864 
00865 void Graph_post_dominator(Graph graph) {
00866         GraphNode node;
00867         GraphNode succ;
00868         GraphArc arc;
00869         Set all;
00870         int change;
00871         Set old_post_dom;
00872         Set new_post_dom;
00873 
00874         if (graph->flags & GRAPHPOSTDOM)
00875                 return;
00876 
00877         /*
00878          *    Initialization
00879          */
00880         all = NULL;
00881         List_start(graph->nodes);
00882         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00883                 if (node->post_dom)
00884                         node->post_dom = Set_dispose(node->post_dom);
00885                 all = Set_add(all, node->id);
00886         }
00887         List_start(graph->nodes);
00888         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00889                 if (List_size(node->succ))
00890                         node->post_dom = Set_union(0, all);
00891                 else
00892                         node->post_dom = Set_add(NULL, node->id);
00893         }
00894 
00895         /*
00896          *    Compute dominance relationship
00897          */
00898         change = 1;
00899         while (change) {
00900                 change = 0;
00901                 List_start(graph->nodes);
00902                 while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00903                         old_post_dom = node->post_dom;
00904                         new_post_dom = NULL;
00905 
00906                         List_start(node->succ);
00907                         while ((arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->succ))) {
00908                                 succ = arc->succ;
00909                                 if (new_post_dom)
00910                                         new_post_dom = Set_intersect_acc(new_post_dom,
00911                                                         succ->post_dom);
00912                                 else
00913                                         new_post_dom = Set_union(new_post_dom, succ->post_dom);
00914                         }
00915                         new_post_dom = Set_add(new_post_dom, node->id);
00916                         if (!Set_same(new_post_dom, old_post_dom)) {
00917                                 change += 1;
00918                                 node->post_dom = Set_dispose(node->post_dom);
00919                                 node->post_dom = new_post_dom;
00920                         } else {
00921                                 new_post_dom = Set_dispose(new_post_dom);
00922                         }
00923                 }
00924         }
00925         graph->flags |= GRAPHPOSTDOM;
00926         all = Set_dispose(all);
00927 }
00928 
00929 /* 
00930  * Assumes immediate postdominator has been computed.
00931  * Graph must have a unique start and stop node as
00932  * determined by first and last node in topological ordering.
00933  */
00934 void Graph_control_dependence(Graph graph) {
00935         GraphNode node;
00936         GraphNode end;
00937         GraphNode dest;
00938         GraphNode final_imm_pdom;
00939         GraphNode cur_imm_pdom;
00940         GraphArc arc;
00941 
00942         if (graph->flags & GRAPHCONTROL)
00943                 return;
00944 
00945         if (!(graph->flags & GRAPHIMMPOSTDOM))
00946                 Graph_imm_post_dominator(graph);
00947 
00948         /* Initialization stuff */
00949         List_start(graph->nodes);
00950         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00951                 node->contr_dep = NULL;
00952         }
00953 
00954         /* Actually compute the control dependences */
00955         Graph_topological_sort(graph);
00956         end = (GraphNode) List_last(graph->topo_list);
00957         List_start(graph->nodes);
00958         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
00959                 List_start(node->succ);
00960                 while ((arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->succ))) {
00961                         dest = GraphArcDest (arc);
00962                         if (!Set_in(node->dom, dest->id) && !Set_in(dest->post_dom,
00963                                         node->id)) {
00964                                 cur_imm_pdom = dest;
00965                                 final_imm_pdom = node->imm_post_dom;
00966                                 while (cur_imm_pdom && final_imm_pdom && (cur_imm_pdom
00967                                                 != final_imm_pdom) && (cur_imm_pdom != end)) {
00968                                         cur_imm_pdom->contr_dep = Set_add(cur_imm_pdom->contr_dep,
00969                                                         arc->id);
00970                                         cur_imm_pdom = cur_imm_pdom->imm_post_dom;
00971                                 }
00972                         }
00973                 }
00974         }
00975         graph->flags |= GRAPHCONTROL;
00976 }
00977 
00978 /* 
00979  * Assumes control dependences are computed.
00980  */
00981 void Graph_equiv_cd(Graph graph) {
00982         GraphNode node;
00983         GraphArc arc;
00984         GraphEquivCD equiv_cd;
00985         Bool found;
00986         int *buf, num_arcs, i;
00987 
00988         if (graph->flags & GRAPHEQUIVCD)
00989                 return;
00990 
00991         if (!(graph->flags & GRAPHCONTROL))
00992                 Graph_control_dependence(graph); /* since it hasn't been run lets run
00993                  it */
00994 
00995         List_start(graph->topo_list);
00996         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->topo_list))) {
00997                 found = FALSE;
00998                 List_start(graph->equiv_cds);
00999                 while ((equiv_cd = (GraphEquivCD) List_next(graph->equiv_cds))) {
01000                         if (Set_same(equiv_cd->contr_dep, node->contr_dep)) {
01001                                 found = TRUE;
01002                                 equiv_cd->nodes = List_insert_last(equiv_cd->nodes, node);
01003                                 node->equiv_cd = equiv_cd;
01004                                 break;
01005                         }
01006                 }
01007                 if (!found) {
01008                         equiv_cd = Graph_create_graph_equiv_cd(graph);
01009                         equiv_cd->contr_dep = Set_union(NULL, node->contr_dep);
01010                         if ((num_arcs = Set_size(node->contr_dep))) {
01011                                 buf = (int *) malloc(sizeof(int) * num_arcs);
01012                                 Set_2array(node->contr_dep, buf);
01013                                 for (i = 0; i < num_arcs; i++) {
01014                                         arc = Graph_arc_from_id(graph, buf[i]);
01015                                         equiv_cd->arcs = List_insert_last(equiv_cd->arcs, arc);
01016                                 }
01017                                 free(buf);
01018                         }
01019                         equiv_cd->nodes = List_insert_last(equiv_cd->nodes, node);
01020                         node->equiv_cd = equiv_cd;
01021                 }
01022         }
01023         graph->flags |= GRAPHEQUIVCD;
01024 }
01025 
01026 /*===========================================================================*/
01027 
01028 static void Graph_count_paths_visit(GraphNode node) {
01029         GraphArc succ_arc;
01030 
01031         if (node->tflags)
01032                 return;
01033 
01034         /* Define Edges */
01035         List_start(node->succ);
01036         while ((succ_arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->succ))) {
01037                 succ_arc->succ->tflags--;
01038                 /* Don't cross backedges */
01039                 if (!Set_in(node->dom, succ_arc->succ->id)) {
01040                         succ_arc->succ->info += node->info;
01041                         Graph_count_paths_visit(succ_arc->succ);
01042                 }
01043         }
01044 }
01045 
01046 /* Assumes dominator has been performed */
01047 void Graph_count_paths(Graph graph) {
01048         GraphNode node;
01049 
01050         if (graph->flags & GRAPHCOUNTPATH)
01051                 return;
01052 
01053         if (!(graph->flags & GRAPHDOM))
01054                 Graph_dominator(graph); /* since it hasn't been run lets run it */
01055 
01056         /* Initialize the predecessor count */
01057         List_start(graph->nodes);
01058         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
01059                 node->tflags = List_size(node->pred);
01060                 node->info = 0;
01061         }
01062 
01063         graph->root->info = 1;
01064         graph->root->tflags = 0;
01065 
01066         Graph_count_paths_visit(graph->root);
01067         graph->flags |= GRAPHCOUNTPATH;
01068 }
01069 
01070 void Graph_dfs_topo_visit(Graph graph, GraphNode node) {
01071         GraphNode dest_node;
01072         GraphArc arc;
01073 
01074         node->tflags = 1;
01075 
01076         List_start(node->succ);
01077         while ((arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->succ))) {
01078                 dest_node = GraphArcDest (arc);
01079                 if (!dest_node->tflags)
01080                         Graph_dfs_topo_visit(graph, dest_node);
01081         }
01082 
01083         graph->topo_list = List_insert_first(graph->topo_list, node);
01084 }
01085 
01086 /* Assumes dominator has been performed */
01087 int Graph_dfs_topo_sort(Graph graph) {
01088         GraphNode node;
01089         int count;
01090 
01091         if (graph->flags & GRAPHTOPOSORT) /* has already been sorted */
01092                 return (List_size(graph->nodes) - List_size(graph->topo_list));
01093 
01094         /* Initialize the predecessor count */
01095         List_start(graph->nodes);
01096         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
01097                 node->tflags = 0;
01098                 node->info = -1;
01099         }
01100 
01101         if (graph->topo_list)
01102                 graph->topo_list = List_reset(graph->topo_list);
01103 
01104         Graph_dfs_topo_visit(graph, graph->root);
01105 
01106         count = 0;
01107         List_start(graph->topo_list);
01108         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->topo_list))) {
01109                 count++;
01110                 node->tflags = 0;
01111                 node->info = count;
01112         }
01113         graph->flags |= GRAPHTOPOSORT;
01114 
01115         return (List_size(graph->nodes) - List_size(graph->topo_list));
01116 }
01117 
01118 static void Graph_bfs_accept_node(Graph g, GraphNode n, List *fl, GraphNode *dn) {
01119         GraphArc a;
01120         GraphNode ns;
01121 
01122         g->topo_list = List_insert_last(g->topo_list, n);
01123         n->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_BLACK;
01124         List_start(n->succ);
01125         while ((a = (GraphArc) List_next(n->succ)))
01126                 if ((ns = GraphArcDest(a))->tflags == GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_WHITE) {
01127                         if (!(ns->flags & GRAPH_NODE_DEFER)) {
01128                                 (*fl) = List_insert_last((*fl), ns);
01129                         } else {
01130                                 if (*dn)
01131                                         I_punt("Graph_bfs_toposort: multiple deferrals illegal");
01132                                 *dn = ns;
01133                         }
01134                         ns->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_GREY;
01135                 }
01136 
01137         return;
01138 }
01139 
01140 /*
01141  * Warning-- assumes the graph starts with a useless start node!
01142  * (specialized for Lblock purposes)
01143  */
01144 
01145 int Graph_bfs_topo_sort(Graph g) {
01146         List frontier = NULL, new_frontier = NULL;
01147         GraphNode n, dn;
01148         GraphArc a;
01149         int progress;
01150 
01151         if (g->flags & GRAPHTOPOSORT) /* has already  been sorted */
01152                 return (List_size(g->nodes) - List_size(g->topo_list));
01153 
01154         if (g->topo_list)
01155                 g->topo_list = List_reset(g->topo_list);
01156 
01157         List_start(g->nodes);
01158         while ((n = (GraphNode) List_next(g->nodes)))
01159                 n->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_WHITE;
01160 
01161         if (g->root)
01162                 Graph_bfs_accept_node(g, g->root, &frontier, &dn);
01163 
01164         dn = NULL;
01165 
01166         do {
01167                 progress = 0;
01168                 new_frontier = NULL;
01169 
01170                 List_start(frontier);
01171                 while ((n = (GraphNode) List_next(frontier))) {
01172                         List_start(n->pred);
01173                         while ((a = (GraphArc) List_next(n->pred))) {
01174                                 /* Find an edge from an unvisited node */
01175 
01176                                 if (GraphArcSrc(a)->tflags != GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_BLACK)
01177                                         break;
01178                         }
01179 
01180                         if (!a || (n->flags & GRAPH_NODE_HEADER)) {
01181                                 Graph_bfs_accept_node(g, n, &new_frontier, &dn);
01182                                 progress++;
01183                         } else {
01184                                 new_frontier = List_insert_last(new_frontier, n);
01185                         }
01186 
01187                         frontier = List_delete_current(frontier);
01188                 }
01189 
01190                 frontier = new_frontier;
01191 
01192                 if (dn && (!progress || !List_size(frontier))) {
01193                         frontier = List_insert_last(frontier, dn);
01194                         dn = NULL;
01195                         progress = 1;
01196                         continue;
01197                 }
01198         } while (progress && List_size(frontier));
01199 
01200         if (!progress && List_size(frontier)) {
01201                 /* BFS algorithm failed (tr contains loop). Use DFS */
01202 
01203                 List_reset(frontier);
01204 
01205                 List_start(g->nodes);
01206                 while ((n = (GraphNode) List_next(g->nodes)))
01207                         n->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_BLACK;
01208 
01209                 if (g->topo_list)
01210                         g->topo_list = List_reset(g->topo_list);
01211 
01212                 I_warn("BFS toposort failed.  Using DFS.");
01213 
01214                 Graph_dfs_topo_sort(g);
01215         }
01216 
01217         g->flags |= GRAPHTOPOSORT;
01218         return (List_size(g->nodes) - List_size(g->topo_list));
01219 }
01220 
01221 int Graph_topological_sort(Graph graph) {
01222         return Graph_dfs_topo_sort(graph);
01223 }
01224 
01225 void Graph_rev_topological_visit(Graph graph, GraphNode node) {
01226         GraphNode src_node;
01227         GraphArc arc;
01228 
01229         node->tflags = 1;
01230 
01231         List_start(node->pred);
01232         while ((arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->pred))) {
01233                 src_node = GraphArcSrc (arc);
01234                 if (!src_node->tflags)
01235                         Graph_rev_topological_visit(graph, src_node);
01236         }
01237 
01238         graph->rev_topo_list = List_insert_first(graph->rev_topo_list, node);
01239 
01240         return;
01241 }
01242 
01243 /* Assumes dominator has been performed */
01244 void Graph_rev_topological_sort(Graph graph) {
01245         GraphNode node, stop = NULL;
01246         int count;
01247 
01248         if (graph->flags & GRAPHREVTOPOSORT) /* hasn't  been sorted */
01249                 return;
01250 
01251         if (!(graph->flags & GRAPHDOM))
01252                 Graph_dominator(graph); /* since it hasn't been run lets run it */
01253 
01254         /* Initialize the predecessor count */
01255         List_start(graph->nodes);
01256         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
01257                 node->tflags = 0;
01258                 node->info = -1;
01259                 if (!node->succ) {
01260                         if (stop)
01261                                 I_punt("Graph_rev_topological_sort: multiple stop nodes");
01262                         else
01263                                 stop = node;
01264                 }
01265         }
01266 
01267         if (graph->rev_topo_list)
01268                 graph->rev_topo_list = List_reset(graph->rev_topo_list);
01269 
01270         Graph_rev_topological_visit(graph, stop);
01271 
01272         count = 0;
01273         List_start(graph->rev_topo_list);
01274         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->rev_topo_list))) {
01275                 count++;
01276                 node->tflags = 0;
01277                 node->info = count;
01278         }
01279         graph->flags |= GRAPHREVTOPOSORT;
01280 }
01281 
01282 void Graph_preorder_dfs_visit(Graph graph, GraphNode node, int directed) {
01283         GraphNode dest_node;
01284         GraphArc arc;
01285 
01286         node->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_GREY;
01287 
01288         graph->dfs_list = List_insert_last(graph->dfs_list, node);
01289 
01290         List_start(node->succ);
01291         while ((arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->succ))) {
01292                 dest_node = GraphArcDest (arc);
01293                 if (directed && (dest_node->tflags == GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_GREY))
01294                         arc->flags |= GRAPH_ARC_BACKEDGE;
01295                 if (dest_node->tflags == GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_WHITE)
01296                         Graph_preorder_dfs_visit(graph, dest_node, directed);
01297         }
01298 
01299         if (!directed) {
01300                 List_start(node->pred);
01301                 while ((arc = (GraphArc) List_next(node->pred))) {
01302                         dest_node = GraphArcSrc (arc);
01303                         if (dest_node->tflags == GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_WHITE)
01304                                 Graph_preorder_dfs_visit(graph, dest_node, directed);
01305                 }
01306         }
01307 
01308         node->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_BLACK;
01309 }
01310 
01311 void Graph_preorder_dfs_sort(Graph graph, int directed) {
01312         GraphNode node;
01313         int count;
01314 
01315         if (graph->flags & GRAPHDFSPRESORT) /* hasn't  been sorted */
01316                 return;
01317 
01318         if (!(graph->flags & GRAPHDOM))
01319                 Graph_dominator(graph); /* since it hasn't been run lets run it */
01320 
01321         /* Initialize the predecessor count */
01322         List_start(graph->nodes);
01323         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->nodes))) {
01324                 node->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_WHITE;
01325                 node->info = -1;
01326         }
01327 
01328         if (graph->dfs_list)
01329                 graph->dfs_list = List_reset(graph->dfs_list);
01330 
01331         Graph_preorder_dfs_visit(graph, graph->root, directed);
01332 
01333         count = 0;
01334         List_start(graph->dfs_list);
01335         while ((node = (GraphNode) List_next(graph->dfs_list))) {
01336                 count++;
01337                 node->tflags = GRAPH_NODE_VISIT_WHITE;
01338                 node->info = count;
01339         }
01340         graph->flags |= GRAPHDFSPRESORT;
01341 }
